trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust" /> namespace contains classes that represent WS-Trust artifacts.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust" /> contém classes que representam os artefatos do WS-Trust.

trans-unit.source: These include the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> (RST) and <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> (RSTR) classes and several serializers that can serialize and deserialize between WS-Trust artifacts on the wire and their representation in the object model.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui as classes <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> (RST) e <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> (RSTR) e vários serializadores que podem serializar e desserializar entre os artefatos WS-Trust na conexão e sua representação no modelo de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Out-of-the-box, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) contains support for the following WS-Trust specifications: <see href="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/trust/">WS-Trust February 2005</see>, <see href="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/200512/ws-trust-1.3-os.html">WS-Trust 1.3</see>, or <see href="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/v1.4/os/ws-trust-1.4-spec-os.html">WS-Trust 1.4</see>.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a WIF (Windows Identity Foundation) é compatível com as seguintes especificações WS-Trust: <see href="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/trust/">WS-Trust de fevereiro de 2005</see>, <see href="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/200512/ws-trust-1.3-os.html">WS-Trust 1.3</see> ou <see href="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/v1.4/os/ws-trust-1.4-spec-os.html">WS-Trust 1.4</see>.
